summary: The module defines a foundational text-based environment for large language models, offering a custom stopping criterion for batch generation, mechanisms to simulate interactions with external tools, stepwise progression, reward calculation, and termination checks, along with a history manager that records and visualizes conversational exchanges.
business_intent: To provide a reusable framework that supports reinforcement learning and tool-augmented workflows for language models, enabling developers to train, evaluate, and fineâ€‘tune models through interactive text simulations and reward feedback.
